reviews.text:
AK sent out a couple of techs to estimate a replacement of a range hood that had broken down.  The were very personable and gave me an estimate for the job.  I called AK's offices and scheduled the appointment for the install.  When the techs were 2 hours late I called the office and left a message of inquiry.  Some short time later I received a call from someone at AK that stated the job wasn't "costly enough" to make it worthwhile to do the job and they were declining the job.
This happened 2

I own a business in Dallas and had an emergency electrical issue come up the day before New Years Eve, a busy day in my business. The Owner Kiethan sent someone out immediately even though it was after hours and Dennis, the electrician who came out was on time, did a great job, and communicated all the issues clearly. He fixed it in less than two hours and did an excellent job. I am super happy and will use them again. Definitely recommend this company!

We're repeat AK customers.  1st time was installing recessed lighting in our kitchen. Now at our new house they have helped diagnose a faulty dryer outlet and ran power to a 2nd AC.  They always do an awesome job and most times are out same day! Love them!

We have had several electrical issues so based off of recommendations from this site a few years ago we called AK Electric out to check it out. First off, when we spoke all he told me about was the initial $75 dollars to come out - which was what it was the last time so I was fine with. Then when he they go to leave and have me sign the paper it’s $75 to come out plus an additional $89.95 for time spent “investigating the issue” < which btw I always thought that’s what the $75 service call was f

AK Electrical has always helped me with my electric issues.  Just came again yesterday called, showed up early and got the issues fixed in a timely manner and was very reasonable.  I will always recommend and use AK Electrical.  Thank you again guys. If you are looking for a trustworthy group and are gonna get you fixed as fast as possible call the guys at AK.

We have been remodeling and adding on to our home. We used AK for everything electrical. They came out and replaced all my switches and plugs since we changed colors and wanted them upgraded. They installed all of our new light fixtures and also moved a few of them. The guys were on time, very nice and cleaned up their mess before they left.
I would highly recommend AK!!!

I had them to put security  cameras  around my  house, they completely  butchered my cealing inside the house with holes, it's going to cost Me 2000 dollars  to fix their mess,  I would not use this company  to screw in a light bulb, very expensive  lesson learned. Since the honest review  I gave,  the owner of the company  came  to  my  house  at 7:30 in the morning,  beat on my door, and then told me  to watch my cameras  because  something  bad  was  going  to  happen to me
This is very unpro

I can’t say enough good things about these guys. My house is quite old, and was an electrical nightmare. After getting 2 quotes from other electricians, I was starting to get discouraged. Then a friend suggested AK Electrical. There quote was about 20% lower than the other guys. I will always use and recommend these guys
Thanks Again
Joseph Lopez

Electrician came to my house to begin with he was LATE! Didn't even fix problem he was suppose to only offering extremely high cost remedy to my problem! He was EXTREMELY SLOW in recognizing he couldn't fix initial problem as well as fixing a few plug ins. I do believe he was racking up my bill. I was quoted $75 then $65 per hour and your electrician racked up my bill to $300. Additionally he left a HUGE HUGE mess and didn't seam to have necessary tools to do the job. It was hard to get him to g
I used AK Electric to replace chandelier lights, thermostat, and doorbell.  They did a great job and very prompt.  Will definitely use again
If you need any work done, Dennis is your guy! Super efficient and quality customer service. Definitely going to ask for him if I need any more work done.

They figured out what was going on in less than ten minutes. Very respectful and informative! I appreciate that I wasn’t given some unnecessary up charge. I’d definitely recommend AK Electrical to anyone that’s having an electrical issue.
I'm very pleased, No more flickering lights! Great customer service, everything was finish in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend this company!
I've heard you can't get maticulous and quality work for a fair price but this guy takes the cake. He gave me exactly what I wanted and did it in a timely matter Thanks AK Electric👌👍😀😀 …
We needed installation of wiring for new electric gate.  Very professional, delivered what we needed and took care of all permits and inspections required for city. Highly recommend!
I was sooo pleased with this company and their work! They were very helpful and nice and very professional about everything!
They were prompt on time and did a fantastic job
Good, competent people. They communicate well, and they're courteous and professional. I recommend them.
They arrived at my house right on time and troubleshooted the problem immediately. Great service!!
Always great service and very reasonable pricing. Everyone that I have recommend has loved the service.
